verses.text: Then he brought me \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* into the \w utter|strong="H2435"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w*, the way \w toward|strong="H1870"\w* the \w north|strong="H6828"\w*: and he \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* me into the \w chamber|strong="H3957"\w* that \add was\add* over against the separate \w place|strong="H1508"\w*, and which \add was\add* before the \w building|strong="H1146"\w* toward the \w north|strong="H6828"\w*.

\w Before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w length|strong="H0753"\w* of an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \add was\add* the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w door|strong="H6607"\w*, and the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* \add was\add* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*.

Over against the \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \add cubits\add* which \add were\add* for the \w inner|strong="H6442"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w*, and over against the \w pavement|strong="H7531"\w* which \add was\add* for the \w utter|strong="H2435"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w*, \add was\add* \w gallery|strong="H0862"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w gallery|strong="H0862"\w* in \w three|strong="H7992"\w* \add stories\add*.

And \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w chambers|strong="H3957"\w* \add was\add* a \w walk|strong="H4109"\w* of \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* \w inward|strong="H6442"\w*, a \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w cubit|strong="H0520"\w*; and their \w doors|strong="H6607"\w* toward the \w north|strong="H6828"\w*.

Now the \w upper|strong="H5945"\w* \w chambers|strong="H3957"\w* \add were\add* \w shorter|strong="H7114"\w*: for the \w galleries|strong="H0862"\w* were \w higher|strong="H0398"\w* than \w these|strong="H2007"\w*, than the \w lower|strong="H8481"\w*, and than the \w middlemost|strong="H8484"\w* of the \w building|strong="H1146"\w*.\f + \fr 42.5 \ft were higher…: or, did eat of these\f*\f + \fr 42.5 \ft than the lower…: or, and the building consisted of the lower and the middlemost\f*

For they \add were\add* in \w three|strong="H8027"\w* \add stories\add*, but had not \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* as the \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* of the \w courts|strong="H2691"\w*: therefore \add the building\add* was \w straitened|strong="H0680"\w* more than the \w lowest|strong="H8481"\w* and the \w middlemost|strong="H8484"\w* from the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*.

And the \w wall|strong="H1447"\w* that \add was\add* \w without|strong="H2351"\w* over \w against|strong="H5980"\w* the \w chambers|strong="H3957"\w*, \w toward|strong="H1870"\w* the \w utter|strong="H2435"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w* on the \w forepart|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w chambers|strong="H3957"\w*, the \w length|strong="H0753"\w* thereof \add was\add* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*.

For the \w length|strong="H0753"\w* of the \w chambers|strong="H3957"\w* that \add were\add* in the \w utter|strong="H2435"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w* \add was\add* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*: and, lo, \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w temple|strong="H1964"\w* \add were\add* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*.

And from under these \w chambers|strong="H3957"\w* \add was\add* the \w entry|strong="H3996"\w* on the east \w side|strong="H6921"\w*, as one \w goeth|strong="H0935"\w* into \w them|strong="H2007"\w* from the \w utter|strong="H2435"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w*.\f + \fr 42.9 \ft from under: or, from the place\f*\f + \fr 42.9 \ft the entry: or, he that brought me\f*\f + \fr 42.9 \ft as…: or, as he came\f*

The \w chambers|strong="H3957"\w* \add were\add* in the \w thickness|strong="H7341"\w* of the \w wall|strong="H1444"\w* of the \w court|strong="H2691"\w* \w toward|strong="H1870"\w* the \w east|strong="H6921"\w*, over \w against|strong="H6440"\w* the separate \w place|strong="H1508"\w*, and over \w against|strong="H6440"\w* the \w building|strong="H1146"\w*.

And the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them \add was\add* like the \w appearance|strong="H4758"\w* of the \w chambers|strong="H3957"\w* which \add were\add* \w toward|strong="H1870"\w* the \w north|strong="H6828"\w*, as long \w as|strong="H0753"\w* they, \add and\add* as broad \w as|strong="H3651"\w* they: and all their goings \w out|strong="H4161"\w* \add were\add* both according to their \w fashions|strong="H4941"\w*, and according to their \w doors|strong="H6607"\w*.

And according to the \w doors|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w chambers|strong="H3957"\w* that \add were\add* \w toward|strong="H1870"\w* the \w south|strong="H1864"\w* \add was\add* a \w door|strong="H6607"\w* in the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, \add even\add* the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w directly|strong="H1903"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w wall|strong="H1448"\w* \w toward|strong="H1870"\w* the \w east|strong="H6921"\w*, as one \w entereth|strong="H0935"\w* into them.

¶ Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* he unto me, The \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w chambers|strong="H3957"\w* \add and\add* the \w south|strong="H1864"\w* \w chambers|strong="H3957"\w*, which \add are\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the separate \w place|strong="H1508"\w*, they \add be\add* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w chambers|strong="H3957"\w*, where the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* that \w approach|strong="H7138"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* the \w most|strong="H6944"\w* holy \w things|strong="H6944"\w*: there shall they \w lay|strong="H3240"\w* the \w most|strong="H6944"\w* holy \w things|strong="H6944"\w*, and the meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, and the sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*, and the trespass \w offering|strong="H0817"\w*; for the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \add is\add* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w*.

When the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* therein, then shall they not go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \add place\add* into the \w utter|strong="H2435"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w*, but there they shall \w lay|strong="H3240"\w* their \w garments|strong="H0899"\w* wherein they \w minister|strong="H8334"\w*; for they \add are\add* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*; and shall \w put|strong="H3847"\w* on \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w garments|strong="H0899"\w*, and shall \w approach|strong="H7126"\w* to \add those things\add* which \add are\add* for the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

Now when he had made an \w end|strong="H3615"\w* of \w measuring|strong="H4060"\w* the \w inner|strong="H6442"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, he brought me \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w toward|strong="H1870"\w* the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* whose \w prospect|strong="H6440"\w* \add is\add* \w toward|strong="H1870"\w* the \w east|strong="H6921"\w*, and \w measured|strong="H4058"\w* it round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*.

He \w measured|strong="H4058"\w* the \w east|strong="H6921"\w* \w side|strong="H7307"\w* with the \w measuring|strong="H4060"\w* \w reed|strong="H7070"\w*, \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w reeds|strong="H7070"\w*, with the \w measuring|strong="H4060"\w* \w reed|strong="H7070"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*.\f + \fr 42.16 \ft side: Heb. wind\f*

He \w measured|strong="H4058"\w* the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w side|strong="H7307"\w*, \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w reeds|strong="H7070"\w*, with the \w measuring|strong="H4060"\w* \w reed|strong="H7070"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*.

He \w measured|strong="H4058"\w* the \w south|strong="H1864"\w* \w side|strong="H7307"\w*, \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w reeds|strong="H7070"\w*, with the \w measuring|strong="H4060"\w* \w reed|strong="H7070"\w*.

¶ He turned \w about|strong="H5437"\w* to the \w west|strong="H3220"\w* \w side|strong="H7307"\w*, \add and\add* \w measured|strong="H4058"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w reeds|strong="H7070"\w* with the \w measuring|strong="H4060"\w* \w reed|strong="H7070"\w*.

He \w measured|strong="H4058"\w* it by the \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w sides|strong="H7307"\w*: it had a \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \add reeds\add* \w long|strong="H0753"\w*, and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w broad|strong="H7341"\w*, to make a \w separation|strong="H0914"\w* between the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w* and the profane \w place|strong="H2455"\w*.
